import React from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; function Login(props) { const {email, setEmail,password,setPassword,handleLogin,handleSignup,hasAccount,setHasAccount,emailError,passwordError} = props; return (





setEmail(e.target.value)}/> We'll never share your email with anyone else.

{emailError}

setPassword(e.target.value)} />

{passwordError}

{hasAccount ? ( <>

You don't have an account? setHasAccount(!hasAccount)}>Sign up

) : ( <>

Do you have an account? onClick={()=> setHasAccount(!hasAccount)}Sign in

)}
{/* */}
) } export default Login
